entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
